DOC.criteria: Healthy infant ; Single birth ; Gestational age â‰¥ 37 week ( =nonpreterm infant , WHO ) ; Birth weight : > 2500g Appropriate weight P20P80 accordance weight percentile standard child age 0 6 year Shanghai urban area inclusion visit ; Aged > 4 month < 6 month ; Infants exclusively formulafed ( breast milk meal ) inclusion visit ; No suffer gastrointestinal disease within 1 month ( CCDC recommendation ) ; Parents agree use one recommend infant formula ( probiotic , prebiotics , exclude GOS 2g/100g FOS inside ) ; Consent form sign least one parent legal tutor properly inform study ; Parents able understand protocol requirement fill infant ' diary . Congenital illness malformation ; Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease ; Mothers metabolic chronic disease ; Infants allergic constitution sensitive probiotic ( CCDC recommendation ) ; Infants serious disease , cardiovascular , cerebrovascular , liver , kidney hematopoietic system diseases internal secretion disease , mental disorder ( CCDC recommendation ) ; Infants administer drug administer study product , thus impossible judge efficacy influence judgment result ( CCDC recommendation ) ; Infants know current previous illnesses/conditions intervention could interfere study ( impact tolerance and/or growth ) , gastrointestinal malformation , chronic diarrhoea , malabsorptive syndrome , malnutrition , congenital immunodeficiency , major surgery , per investigator 's clinical judgment ; Infant oral antibiotic treatment V1 visit within 4 week V1 Infants use medication nutritional supplement ( include probiotic , prebiotics etc , except infant formula ) 4 week precede study start ; Infants ever consume test product ; Infants medical condition special diet standard ( non hydrolyze ) cow 's milkbased infant formula require ( cow 's milk allergy , soy protein allergy , fish protein allergy , egg protein allergy , lactose intolerance , galactosemia ) ; Currently participate participate another clinical trial last month . Infants whose legal representative psychological linguistic incapability sign inform consent form Reasons presume parent unable meet study plan requirement ( e.g . impossibility contact study representative case emergency , drug addiction etc . )
